[2025-01-01 03:41:48]   model: "o1-mini"
[2025-01-01 03:41:48] 
Output:
[2025-01-01 03:41:48]   "# Website Plan: Explore Me\n\n## Overview\n**Explore Me** is a modern and clean single-page portfolio website designed to showcase your design projects. The site emphasizes bold typography, ample white space, and interactive elements to create an engaging user experience. The design incorporates subtle animations and playful elements to reflect creativity and professionalism.\n\n## Design Style\n- **Theme:** Modern and clean with bold accents\n- **Typography:** Large, prominent fonts for headlines; readable sans-serif fonts for body text\n- **Color Scheme:** Predominantly white background with bold accent colors (e.g., deep blue, vibrant orange) for highlights\n- **Layout:** Spacious with generous white space to enhance readability and focus on content\n- **Interactivity:** Subtle animations, hover effects, and interactive sliders to engage users\n\n## Site Structure\nA single-page website divided into the following sections:\n1. **Hero Section**\n2. **About Me**\n3. **Portfolio**\n4. **Testimonials**\n5. **Contact**\n6. **Easter Egg**\n\n## Detailed Sections\n\n### 1. Hero Section\n- **Purpose:** Make a strong first impression and communicate your design philosophy.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Animated Headline:** \u201cDesigning Ideas into Reality\u201d with bold, large typography.\n  - **Background:** Clean, solid color background to keep the focus on the headline.\n  - **Call to Action (Optional):** A subtle scroll indicator or button prompting users to explore further.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Center-aligned text.\n  - Smooth entrance animation for the headline to grab attention.\n  - Consistent padding and margin to maintain white space.\n\n### 2. About Me\n- **Purpose:** Introduce yourself and provide context about your skills and background.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Profile Photo:** Circular cropped image placed subtly on one side.\n  - **Bio Text:** Brief introduction highlighting your expertise, experience, and passion for design.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Two-column layout with the photo on one side and text on the other for desktop views; stacked layout for mobile.\n  - Clean typography with clear hierarchy.\n  - Consistent color usage matching the overall theme.\n\n### 3. Portfolio\n- **Purpose:** Showcase your design projects effectively.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Project Grid:** Responsive grid layout displaying project thumbnails.\n  - **Hover Effects:** On hover, display the project title and a short description.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Uniform sizing for project thumbnails to maintain a cohesive look.\n  - Smooth hover transitions to enhance interactivity.\n  - Clickable projects that can link to detailed views or external sites (optional).\n\n### 4. Testimonials\n- **Purpose:** Build credibility through client feedback.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Slider/Carousel:** Automatically or manually scroll through client testimonials.\n  - **Testimonial Cards:** Modern card design for each testimonial featuring client quotes, names, and optionally their titles or companies.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Smooth sliding animations for transitions between testimonials.\n  - Consistent card styling with adequate padding and margins.\n  - Navigation controls (e.g., arrows or dots) for user interaction.\n\n### 5. Contact\n- **Purpose:** Provide an easy way for visitors to get in touch with you.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Contact Form:** Clean and modern form with fields for Name, Email, and Message.\n    - **Placeholder Text:** Guiding text within form fields to enhance usability.\n  - **Social Media Links:** Icons linking to your professional social profiles.\n  - **Email Button:** Direct link to your email for quick contact.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Minimalist form design with clear labels and input fields.\n  - Consistent styling with other sections.\n  - Responsive layout to ensure accessibility on all devices.\n\n### 6. Easter Egg\n- **Purpose:** Add a fun and memorable element to delight visitors.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Hidden Animation:** A small doodle animation that appears when users hover over the footer logo.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Subtle integration to ensure it doesn't distract from main content.\n  - Animation style that complements the overall website aesthetics.\n\n## Additional Features\n\n### Responsive Design\n- Ensure the website is fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.\n- Utilize flexible grid layouts and media queries to adjust content layout based on screen size.\n\n### SEO Optimization\n- Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility:\n  - Use descriptive meta titles and descriptions for the site.\n  - Optimize image alt texts for better accessibility and SEO.\n  - Ensure fast loading times through optimized images and minified code.\n\n### Performance Optimization\n- Optimize website performance to ensure quick load times:\n  - Compress images without compromising quality.\n  - Minimize CSS and JavaScript files.\n  - Leverage browser caching and content delivery networks (CDNs) if necessary.\n\n### Accessibility\n- Adhere to WCAG guidelines to make the website accessible to all users:\n  - Ensure sufficient color contrast between text and backgrounds.\n  - Provide keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.\n  - Use semantic HTML to enhance screen reader compatibility.\n\n## Suggested Tools and Technologies\n- **Frontend Development:**\n  - **HTML5 & CSS3:** For structure and styling.\n  - **JavaScript:** For interactivity and animations.\n  - **CSS Frameworks (Optional):** Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap for faster development.\n- **Animations:**\n  - **CSS Animations:** For simple transitions and effects.\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** GSAP or AOS for more complex animations.\n- **Slider Implementation:**\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** Swiper.js or Slick Carousel for the Testimonials section.\n- **Version Control:**\n  - **Git:** For tracking changes and collaboration.\n\n## Timeline\n\n| **Week** | **Tasks**                                           |\n|----------|-----------------------------------------------------|\n| 1        | Gather content (text, images, project details)      |\n| 2        | Create design mockups and finalize the design style |\n| 3        | Develop Hero, About Me, and Portfolio sections      |\n| 4        | Implement Testimonials and Contact sections         |\n| 5        | Add interactivity and Easter egg                    |\n| 6        | Conduct testing (responsive design, performance)    |\n| 7        | Optimize SEO and accessibility                      |\n| 8        | Final review and deployment                         |\n\n## Next Steps\n1. **Content Collection:** Gather all necessary content, including high-quality images of your projects, a professional photo for the About Me section, and testimonials from clients.\n2. **Design Mockups:** Create visual mockups for each section to visualize the layout and design elements.\n3. **Development:** Start building the website section by section, ensuring responsiveness and interactivity.\n4. **Testing:** Rigorously test the website across different devices and browsers to ensure functionality and performance.\n5. **Launch:** Deploy the website to your chosen hosting platform and perform a final review.\n6. **Monitor & Iterate:** After launch, monitor site performance and user feedback to make necessary improvements.\n\n---\n\nThis structured plan provides a clear roadmap for designing and developing the **Explore Me** portfolio website. By adhering to this plan, you can create a visually appealing, functional, and user-friendly website that effectively showcases your design projects."
[2025-01-01 03:41:48] ==================================================

The site emphasizes bold typography, ample white space, and interactive elements to create an engaging user experience. The design incorporates subtle animations and playful elements to reflect creativity and professionalism.\n\n## Design Style\n- **Theme:** Modern and clean with bold accents\n- **Typography:** Large, prominent fonts for headlines; readable sans-serif fonts for body text\n- **Color Scheme:** Predominantly white background with bold accent colors (e.g., deep blue, vibrant orange) for highlights\n- **Layout:** Spacious with generous white space to enhance readability and focus on content\n- **Interactivity:** Subtle animations, hover effects, and interactive sliders to engage users\n\n## Site Structure\nA single-page website divided into the following sections:\n1. **Hero Section**\n2. **About Me**\n3. **Portfolio**\n4. **Testimonials**\n5. **Contact**\n6. **Easter Egg**\n\n## Detailed Sections\n\n### 1. Hero Section\n- **Purpose:** Make a strong first impression and communicate your design philosophy.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Animated Headline:** \u201cDesigning Ideas into Reality\u201d with bold, large typography.\n  - **Background:** Clean, solid color background to keep the focus on the headline.\n  - **Call to Action (Optional):** A subtle scroll indicator or button prompting users to explore further.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Center-aligned text.\n  - Smooth entrance animation for the headline to grab attention.\n  - Consistent padding and margin to maintain white space.\n\n### 2. About Me\n- **Purpose:** Introduce yourself and provide context about your skills and background.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Profile Photo:** Circular cropped image placed subtly on one side.\n  - **Bio Text:** Brief introduction highlighting your expertise, experience, and passion for design.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Two-column layout with the photo on one side and text on the other for desktop views; stacked layout for mobile.\n  - Clean typography with clear hierarchy.\n  - Consistent color usage matching the overall theme.\n\n### 3. Portfolio\n- **Purpose:** Showcase your design projects effectively.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Project Grid:** Responsive grid layout displaying project thumbnails.\n  - **Hover Effects:** On hover, display the project title and a short description.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Uniform sizing for project thumbnails to maintain a cohesive look.\n  - Smooth hover transitions to enhance interactivity.\n  - Clickable projects that can link to detailed views or external sites (optional).\n\n### 4. Testimonials\n- **Purpose:** Build credibility through client feedback.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Slider/Carousel:** Automatically or manually scroll through client testimonials.\n  - **Testimonial Cards:** Modern card design for each testimonial featuring client quotes, names, and optionally their titles or companies.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Smooth sliding animations for transitions between testimonials.\n  - Consistent card styling with adequate padding and margins.\n  - Navigation controls (e.g., arrows or dots) for user interaction.\n\n### 5. Contact\n- **Purpose:** Provide an easy way for visitors to get in touch with you.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Contact Form:** Clean and modern form with fields for Name, Email, and Message.\n    - **Placeholder Text:** Guiding text within form fields to enhance usability.\n  - **Social Media Links:** Icons linking to your professional social profiles.\n  - **Email Button:** Direct link to your email for quick contact.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Minimalist form design with clear labels and input fields.\n  - Consistent styling with other sections.\n  - Responsive layout to ensure accessibility on all devices.\n\n### 6. Easter Egg\n- **Purpose:** Add a fun and memorable element to delight visitors.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Hidden Animation:** A small doodle animation that appears when users hover over the footer logo.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Subtle integration to ensure it doesn't distract from main content.\n  - Animation style that complements the overall website aesthetics.\n\n## Additional Features\n\n### Responsive Design\n- Ensure the website is fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.\n- Utilize flexible grid layouts and media queries to adjust content layout based on screen size.\n\n### SEO Optimization\n- Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility:\n  - Use descriptive meta titles and descriptions for the site.\n  - Optimize image alt texts for better accessibility and SEO.\n  - Ensure fast loading times through optimized images and minified code.\n\n### Performance Optimization\n- Optimize website performance to ensure quick load times:\n  - Compress images without compromising quality.\n  - Minimize CSS and JavaScript files.\n  - Leverage browser caching and content delivery networks (CDNs) if necessary.\n\n### Accessibility\n- Adhere to WCAG guidelines to make the website accessible to all users:\n  - Ensure sufficient color contrast between text and backgrounds.\n  - Provide keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.\n  - Use semantic HTML to enhance screen reader compatibility.\n\n## Suggested Tools and Technologies\n- **Frontend Development:**\n  - **HTML5 & CSS3:** For structure and styling.\n  - **JavaScript:** For interactivity and animations.\n  - **CSS Frameworks (Optional):** Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap for faster development.\n- **Animations:**\n  - **CSS Animations:** For simple transitions and effects.\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** GSAP or AOS for more complex animations.\n- **Slider Implementation:**\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** Swiper.js or Slick Carousel for the Testimonials section.\n- **Version Control:**\n  - **Git:** For tracking changes and collaboration.\n\n## Timeline\n\n| **Week** | **Tasks**                                           |\n|----------|-----------------------------------------------------|\n| 1        | Gather content (text, images, project details)      |\n| 2        | Create design mockups and finalize the design style |\n| 3        | Develop Hero, About Me, and Portfolio sections      |\n| 4        | Implement Testimonials and Contact sections         |\n| 5        | Add interactivity and Easter egg                    |\n| 6        | Conduct testing (responsive design, performance)    |\n| 7        | Optimize SEO and accessibility                      |\n| 8        | Final review and deployment                         |\n\n## Next Steps\n1. **Content Collection:** Gather all necessary content, including high-quality images of your projects, a professional photo for the About Me section, and testimonials from clients.\n2. **Design Mockups:** Create visual mockups for each section to visualize the layout and design elements.\n3. **Development:** Start building the website section by section, ensuring responsiveness and interactivity.\n4. **Testing:** Rigorously test the website across different devices and browsers to ensure functionality and performance.\n5. **Launch:** Deploy the website to your chosen hosting platform and perform a final review.\n6. **Monitor & Iterate:** After launch, monitor site performance and user feedback to make necessary improvements.\n\n---\n\nThis structured plan provides a clear roadmap for designing and developing the **Explore Me** portfolio website. By adhering to this plan, you can create a visually appealing, functional, and user-friendly website that effectively showcases your design projects."

Step 7: Generating initial website code...

[2025-01-01 03:43:05] Inputs:
[2025-01-01 03:43:05]   website_plan: "# Website Plan: Explore Me\n\n## Overview\n**Explore Me** is a modern and clean single-page portfolio website designed to showcase your design projects. The site emphasizes bold typography, ample white space, and interactive elements to create an engaging user experience. The design incorporates subtle animations and playful elements to reflect creativity and professionalism.\n\n## Design Style\n- **Theme:** Modern and clean with bold accents\n- **Typography:** Large, prominent fonts for headlines; readable sans-serif fonts for body text\n- **Color Scheme:** Predominantly white background with bold accent colors (e.g., deep blue, vibrant orange) for highlights\n- **Layout:** Spacious with generous white space to enhance readability and focus on content\n- **Interactivity:** Subtle animations, hover effects, and interactive sliders to engage users\n\n## Site Structure\nA single-page website divided into the following sections:\n1. **Hero Section**\n2. **About Me**\n3. **Portfolio**\n4. **Testimonials**\n5. **Contact**\n6. **Easter Egg**\n\n## Detailed Sections\n\n### 1. Hero Section\n- **Purpose:** Make a strong first impression and communicate your design philosophy.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Animated Headline:** \u201cDesigning Ideas into Reality\u201d with bold, large typography.\n  - **Background:** Clean, solid color background to keep the focus on the headline.\n  - **Call to Action (Optional):** A subtle scroll indicator or button prompting users to explore further.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Center-aligned text.\n  - Smooth entrance animation for the headline to grab attention.\n  - Consistent padding and margin to maintain white space.\n\n### 2. About Me\n- **Purpose:** Introduce yourself and provide context about your skills and background.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Profile Photo:** Circular cropped image placed subtly on one side.\n  - **Bio Text:** Brief introduction highlighting your expertise, experience, and passion for design.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Two-column layout with the photo on one side and text on the other for desktop views; stacked layout for mobile.\n  - Clean typography with clear hierarchy.\n  - Consistent color usage matching the overall theme.\n\n### 3. Portfolio\n- **Purpose:** Showcase your design projects effectively.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Project Grid:** Responsive grid layout displaying project thumbnails.\n  - **Hover Effects:** On hover, display the project title and a short description.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Uniform sizing for project thumbnails to maintain a cohesive look.\n  - Smooth hover transitions to enhance interactivity.\n  - Clickable projects that can link to detailed views or external sites (optional).\n\n### 4. Testimonials\n- **Purpose:** Build credibility through client feedback.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Slider/Carousel:** Automatically or manually scroll through client testimonials.\n  - **Testimonial Cards:** Modern card design for each testimonial featuring client quotes, names, and optionally their titles or companies.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Smooth sliding animations for transitions between testimonials.\n  - Consistent card styling with adequate padding and margins.\n  - Navigation controls (e.g., arrows or dots) for user interaction.\n\n### 5. Contact\n- **Purpose:** Provide an easy way for visitors to get in touch with you.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Contact Form:** Clean and modern form with fields for Name, Email, and Message.\n    - **Placeholder Text:** Guiding text within form fields to enhance usability.\n  - **Social Media Links:** Icons linking to your professional social profiles.\n  - **Email Button:** Direct link to your email for quick contact.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Minimalist form design with clear labels and input fields.\n  - Consistent styling with other sections.\n  - Responsive layout to ensure accessibility on all devices.\n\n### 6. Easter Egg\n- **Purpose:** Add a fun and memorable element to delight visitors.\n- **Features:**\n  - **Hidden Animation:** A small doodle animation that appears when users hover over the footer logo.\n- **Design Elements:**\n  - Subtle integration to ensure it doesn't distract from main content.\n  - Animation style that complements the overall website aesthetics.\n\n## Additional Features\n\n### Responsive Design\n- Ensure the website is fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.\n- Utilize flexible grid layouts and media queries to adjust content layout based on screen size.\n\n### SEO Optimization\n- Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility:\n  - Use descriptive meta titles and descriptions for the site.\n  - Optimize image alt texts for better accessibility and SEO.\n  - Ensure fast loading times through optimized images and minified code.\n\n### Performance Optimization\n- Optimize website performance to ensure quick load times:\n  - Compress images without compromising quality.\n  - Minimize CSS and JavaScript files.\n  - Leverage browser caching and content delivery networks (CDNs) if necessary.\n\n### Accessibility\n- Adhere to WCAG guidelines to make the website accessible to all users:\n  - Ensure sufficient color contrast between text and backgrounds.\n  - Provide keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.\n  - Use semantic HTML to enhance screen reader compatibility.\n\n## Suggested Tools and Technologies\n- **Frontend Development:**\n  - **HTML5 & CSS3:** For structure and styling.\n  - **JavaScript:** For interactivity and animations.\n  - **CSS Frameworks (Optional):** Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap for faster development.\n- **Animations:**\n  - **CSS Animations:** For simple transitions and effects.\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** GSAP or AOS for more complex animations.\n- **Slider Implementation:**\n  - **JavaScript Libraries:** Swiper.js or Slick Carousel for the Testimonials section.\n- **Version Control:**\n  - **Git:** For tracking changes and collaboration.\n\n## Timeline\n\n| **Week** | **Tasks**                                           |\n|----------|-----------------------------------------------------|\n| 1        | Gather content (text, images, project details)      |\n| 2        | Create design mockups and finalize the design style |\n| 3        | Develop Hero, About Me, and Portfolio sections      |\n| 4        | Implement Testimonials and Contact sections         |\n| 5        | Add interactivity and Easter egg                    |\n| 6        | Conduct testing (responsive design, performance)    |\n| 7        | Optimize SEO and accessibility                      |\n| 8        | Final review and deployment                         |\n\n## Next Steps\n1. **Content Collection:** Gather all necessary content, including high-quality images of your projects, a professional photo for the About Me section, and testimonials from clients.\n2. **Design Mockups:** Create visual mockups for each section to visualize the layout and design elements.\n3. **Development:** Start building the website section by section, ensuring responsiveness and interactivity.\n4. **Testing:** Rigorously test the website across different devices and browsers to ensure functionality and performance.\n5. **Launch:** Deploy the website to your chosen hosting platform and perform a final review.\n6. **Monitor & Iterate:** After launch, monitor site performance and user feedback to make necessary improvements.\n\n---\n\nThis structured plan provides a clear roadmap for designing and developing the **Explore Me** portfolio website. By adhering to this plan, you can create a visually appealing, functional, and user-friendly website that effectively showcases your design projects."

     gsap.to('#hero-title', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 0.5, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero p', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 1, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero a', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 1.5, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero .fa-chevron-down', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 2, ease: 'power3.out'});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Footer Easter Egg -->\n    <script>\n        const footerLogo = document.getElementById('footer-logo');\n        const easterEgg = document.getElementById('easter-egg-animation');\n\n        footerLogo.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {\n            easterEgg.classList.remove('hidden');\n            gsap.to(easterEgg, {duration: 0.5, opacity: 1, scale: 1, ease: 'power3.out'});\n        });\n\n        footerLogo.addEventListener('mouseout', () => {\n            gsap.to(easterEgg, {duration: 0.5, opacity: 0, scale: 0, ease: 'power3.in', onComplete: () => {\n                easterEgg.classList.add('hidden');\n            }});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Framer Motion (Sample Usage) -->\n    <script>\n        // Since Framer Motion is primarily for React, here's a simple demonstration using GSAP for vanilla JS\n        // You can replace or extend this with more complex animations as needed\n        document.querySelectorAll('.animate-fade-in-up').forEach(element => {\n            gsap.from(element, {opacity: 0, y: 20, duration: 1, ease: 'power3.out', stagger: 0.2});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Accessibility Enhancements -->\n    <script>\n        // Ensure tabindex for interactive elements\n        const focusableElements = document.querySelectorAll('a, button, input, textarea');\n        focusableElements.forEach(el => {\n            if (!el.hasAttribute('tabindex')) {\n                el.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## All Files Completed."

   <script>\n        const swiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {\n            loop: true,\n            autoplay: {\n                delay: 5000,\n                disableOnInteraction: false,\n            },\n            pagination: {\n                el: '.swiper-pagination',\n                clickable: true,\n            },\n            navigation: {\n                nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',\n                prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',\n            },\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Header and Mobile Menu Toggle -->\n    <script>\n        const menuBtn = document.getElementById('menu-btn');\n        const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n\n        menuBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            mobileMenu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- GSAP Animations for Hero Section -->\n    <script>\n        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {\n            gsap.to('#hero-title', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 0.5, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero p', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 1, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero a', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 1.5, ease: 'power3.out'});\n            gsap.to('#hero .fa-chevron-down', {duration: 1.5, opacity: 1, y: 0, delay: 2, ease: 'power3.out'});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Footer Easter Egg -->\n    <script>\n        const footerLogo = document.getElementById('footer-logo');\n        const easterEgg = document.getElementById('easter-egg-animation');\n\n        footerLogo.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {\n            easterEgg.classList.remove('hidden');\n            gsap.to(easterEgg, {duration: 0.5, opacity: 1, scale: 1, ease: 'power3.out'});\n        });\n\n        footerLogo.addEventListener('mouseout', () => {\n            gsap.to(easterEgg, {duration: 0.5, opacity: 0, scale: 0, ease: 'power3.in', onComplete: () => {\n                easterEgg.classList.add('hidden');\n            }});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Framer Motion (Sample Usage) -->\n    <script>\n        // Since Framer Motion is primarily for React, here's a simple demonstration using GSAP for vanilla JS\n        // You can replace or extend this with more complex animations as needed\n        document.querySelectorAll('.animate-fade-in-up').forEach(element => {\n            gsap.from(element, {opacity: 0, y: 20, duration: 1, ease: 'power3.out', stagger: 0.2});\n        });\n    </script>\n\n    <!-- Accessibility Enhancements -->\n    <script>\n        // Ensure tabindex for interactive elements\n        const focusableElements = document.querySelectorAll('a, button, input, textarea');\n        focusableElements.forEach(el => {\n            if (!el.hasAttribute('tabindex')) {\n                el.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## All Files Completed."

[2025-01-02 00:17:41]   "# Website Plan: Explore Me\n## Portfolio Website Design Document\n\n### 1. Overview\nA single-page portfolio website featuring modern design, bold typography, and ample white space to showcase design projects professionally.\n\n### 2. Design Direction\n- **Style**: Modern and clean with bold elements\n- **Typography**: Large, impactful fonts for headlines\n- **Color Scheme**: \n  - Primary: White background for clean spaces\n  - Secondary: Bold accent colors (to be selected)\n  - Text: High contrast dark colors\n\n### 3. Page Structure\n**Single Page with Smooth Scroll Navigation**\n\n#### Header\n- Fixed navigation bar\n- Logo: \"Explore Me\"\n- Menu items linking to sections\n- Hamburger menu for mobile view\n\n#### Sections\n\n##### a. Hero Section\n- Clean background (white/minimal)\n- Animated headline: \"Designing Ideas into Reality\"\n- Subtle entrance animations\n- Call-to-action button to portfolio section\n\n##### b. About Me\n- Two-column layout\n- Left: Circular cropped profile photo with subtle hover effect\n- Right: Personal bio and expertise\n- Skills visualization (possibly animated progress bars)\n\n##### c. Portfolio\n- Grid layout (3x2 or 2x3)\n- Hover effects:\n  - Overlay with project title\n  - Brief description\n  - Technologies used\n- Filter options by project type\n- Click to expand project details in modal\n\n##### d. Testimonials\n- Modern card-based slider\n- Auto-play with pause on hover\n- Client photo, name, and company\n- Navigation dots\n- Previous/Next arrows\n\n##### e. Contact\n- Clean form design with:\n  - Name field\n  - Email field\n  - Subject dropdown\n  - Message area\n  - Modern submit button\n- Social media links with hover animations\n- Email button with copy-to-clipboard function\n- Success/error message animations\n\n#### Footer\n- Copyright information\n- Social media links\n- Easter egg: Hidden doodle animation on logo hover\n- Back to top button\n\n### 4. Interactive Elements\n- Smooth scroll navigation\n- Hover effects on portfolio items\n- Testimonial slider controls\n- Form validation animations\n- Easter egg animation\n- Mobile-friendly touch interactions\n\n### 5. Technical Specifications\n- Responsive design (mobile-first approach)\n- Performance optimization for images\n- CSS animations for smooth transitions\n- Form validation and submission handling\n- Cross-browser compatibility\n- Loading animations\n\n### 6. Special Features\n- Custom cursor on interactive elements\n- Scroll-triggered animations\n- Progressive image loading\n- Form auto-complete suggestions\n- Social media integration\n- Easter egg interaction in footer\n\n### 7. Mobile Considerations\n- Streamlined navigation\n- Optimized images\n- Simplified animations\n- Touch-friendly interface\n- Maintained functionality across devices\n\nThis plan creates a cohesive, modern portfolio website that maintains simplicity while incorporating engaging interactive elements and professional presentation of work."

[2025-01-02 00:17:47] Inputs:
[2025-01-02 00:17:47]   structured_plan: "# Website Plan: Explore Me\n## Portfolio Website Design Document\n\n### 1. Overview\nA single-page portfolio website featuring modern design, bold typography, and ample white space to showcase design projects professionally.\n\n### 2. Design Direction\n- **Style**: Modern and clean with bold elements\n- **Typography**: Large, impactful fonts for headlines\n- **Color Scheme**: \n  - Primary: White background for clean spaces\n  - Secondary: Bold accent colors (to be selected)\n  - Text: High contrast dark colors\n\n### 3. Page Structure\n**Single Page with Smooth Scroll Navigation**\n\n#### Header\n- Fixed navigation bar\n- Logo: \"Explore Me\"\n- Menu items linking to sections\n- Hamburger menu for mobile view\n\n#### Sections\n\n##### a. Hero Section\n- Clean background (white/minimal)\n- Animated headline: \"Designing Ideas into Reality\"\n- Subtle entrance animations\n- Call-to-action button to portfolio section\n\n##### b. About Me\n- Two-column layout\n- Left: Circular cropped profile photo with subtle hover effect\n- Right: Personal bio and expertise\n- Skills visualization (possibly animated progress bars)\n\n##### c. Portfolio\n- Grid layout (3x2 or 2x3)\n- Hover effects:\n  - Overlay with project title\n  - Brief description\n  - Technologies used\n- Filter options by project type\n- Click to expand project details in modal\n\n##### d. Testimonials\n- Modern card-based slider\n- Auto-play with pause on hover\n- Client photo, name, and company\n- Navigation dots\n- Previous/Next arrows\n\n##### e. Contact\n- Clean form design with:\n  - Name field\n  - Email field\n  - Subject dropdown\n  - Message area\n  - Modern submit button\n- Social media links with hover animations\n- Email button with copy-to-clipboard function\n- Success/error message animations\n\n#### Footer\n- Copyright information\n- Social media links\n- Easter egg: Hidden doodle animation on logo hover\n- Back to top button\n\n### 4. Interactive Elements\n- Smooth scroll navigation\n- Hover effects on portfolio items\n- Testimonial slider controls\n- Form validation animations\n- Easter egg animation\n- Mobile-friendly touch interactions\n\n### 5. Technical Specifications\n- Responsive design (mobile-first approach)\n- Performance optimization for images\n- CSS animations for smooth transitions\n- Form validation and submission handling\n- Cross-browser compatibility\n- Loading animations\n\n### 6. Special Features\n- Custom cursor on interactive elements\n- Scroll-triggered animations\n- Progressive image loading\n- Form auto-complete suggestions\n- Social media integration\n- Easter egg interaction in footer\n\n### 7. Mobile Considerations\n- Streamlined navigation\n- Optimized images\n- Simplified animations\n- Touch-friendly interface\n- Maintained functionality across devices\n\nThis plan creates a cohesive, modern portfolio website that maintains simplicity while incorporating engaging interactive elements and professional presentation of work."

         modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; </div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Hero.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" alt=\"Placeholder Image\" class=\"mx-auto rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">\n        <figcaption class=\"mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500\">This is a caption for the placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Portfolio.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"container mx-auto px-4 py-8\" aria-labelledby=\"portfolio-section\">\n  <h2 name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">\n     <!--PAID Tailwind CSS CDN -- DO NOT CHANGE -->\n    <script src=\"https://cdn.tailwindcss.com\"></script>\n    <!-- Font <title>Testimonials</title>\n</head>\n<body>\n<div class=\"bg-white shadow-md\">\n  <nav class=\"container mx-auto flex justify-between items-center p-4\" aria-label=\"Main Navigation\">\n    <div href=\"#\" class=\"text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors\">Link One</a></li>\n      <li><a href=\"#\" class=\"text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors\">Link Two</a></li>\n      <li><a href=\"#\" class=\"text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors\">Link Three</a></li>\n      <li class=\"relative group\">\n        <button class=\"flex items-center text-gray-700 duration-200 group-hover:rotate-180\"></i>\n        </button>\n        <div class=\"absolute left-0 mt-2 w-64 bg-white shadow-lg rounded-md opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300 z-10\">\n          <div class=\"p-4 border-b\">\n            <h3 class=\"font-semibold text-gray-800\">Page Group One</h3>\n            <ul class=\"mt-2 space-y-1\">\n              <li><a document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" [2025-01-02 00:18:37]   website_plan: "# Website Plan: Explore Me\n## Portfolio Website Design Document\n\n### 1. Overview\nA single-page portfolio website featuring modern design, bold typography, and ample white space to showcase design projects professionally.\n\n### 2. Design Direction\n- **Style**: Modern and clean with bold elements\n- **Typography**: Large, impactful fonts for headlines\n- **Color Scheme**: \n  - Primary: White background for clean spaces\n  - Secondary: Bold accent colors (to be selected)\n  - Text: High contrast dark colors\n\n### 3. Page Structure\n**Single Page with Smooth Scroll Navigation**\n\n#### Header\n- Fixed navigation bar\n- Logo: \"Explore Me\"\n- Menu items linking to sections\n- Hamburger menu for mobile view\n\n#### Sections\n\n##### a. Hero Section\n- Clean background (white/minimal)\n- Animated headline: \"Designing Ideas into Reality\"\n- Subtle entrance animations\n- Call-to-action button to portfolio section\n\n##### b. About Me\n- Two-column layout\n- Left: Circular cropped profile photo with subtle hover effect\n- Right: Personal bio and expertise\n- Skills visualization (possibly animated progress bars)\n\n##### c. Portfolio\n- Grid layout (3x2 or 2x3)\n- Hover effects:\n  - Overlay with project title\n  - Brief description\n  - Technologies used\n- Filter options by project type\n- Click to expand project details in modal\n\n##### d. Testimonials\n- Modern card-based slider\n- Auto-play with pause on hover\n- Client photo, name, and company\n- Navigation dots\n- Previous/Next arrows\n\n##### e. Contact\n- Clean form design with:\n  - Name field\n  - Email field\n  - Subject dropdown\n  - Message area\n  - Modern submit button\n- Social media links with hover animations\n- Email button with copy-to-clipboard function\n- Success/error message animations\n\n#### Footer\n- Copyright information\n- Social media links\n- Easter egg: Hidden doodle animation on logo hover\n- Back to top button\n\n### 4. Interactive Elements\n- Smooth scroll navigation\n- Hover effects on portfolio items\n- Testimonial slider controls\n- Form validation animations\n- Easter egg animation\n- Mobile-friendly touch interactions\n\n### 5. Technical Specifications\n- Responsive design (mobile-first approach)\n- Performance optimization for images\n- CSS animations for smooth transitions\n- Form validation and submission handling\n- Cross-browser compatibility\n- Loading animations\n\n### 6. Special Features\n- Custom cursor on interactive elements\n- Scroll-triggered animations\n- Progressive image loading\n- Form auto-complete suggestions\n- Social media integration\n- Easter egg interaction in footer\n\n### 7. Mobile Considerations\n- Streamlined navigation\n- Optimized images\n- Simplified animations\n- Touch-friendly interface\n- Maintained functionality across devices\n\nThis plan creates a cohesive, modern portfolio website that maintains simplicity while incorporating engaging interactive elements and professional presentation of work."

hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" alt=\"Placeholder Image\" class=\"mx-auto rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">\n        <figcaption class=\"mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500\">This is a caption for the placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Portfolio.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"container mx-auto px-4 py-8\" aria-labelledby=\"portfolio-section\">\n  <h2 <title>Testimonials</title>\n</head>\n<body>\n<div class=\"bg-white shadow-md\">\n  <nav class=\"container mx-auto flex justify-between items-center p-4\" aria-label=\"Main Navigation\">\n    <div   <li><a href=\"#\" class=\"text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors\">Link Three</a></li>\n      <li class=\"relative group\">\n        <button class=\"flex items-center text-gray-700 document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" [2025-01-05 04:35:23]   "# Website Plan for \"Hehe\" - AI Marketing Analytics Platform\n\n## Purpose\nTo deliver a streamlined landing page for a marketing analytics platform that utilizes AI technology to provide instant responses to queries related to social media and ad analytics. The platform aims to simplify data analysis for marketing professionals and business owners, facilitating quick, data-driven decision-making.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Marketing professionals\n- Social media managers\n- Business owners\n- Advertisers\n\n## Website Structure\n\n### Page 1: Home\n**Objective:** Introduce the platform and highlight its key features.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Hero Section:**\n   - Platform name and tagline.\n   - Brief introduction video or animation showcasing the AI chatbot in action.\n   - Strong CTA buttons for \"Sign Up\" and \"Schedule a Demo.\"\n\n2. **Platform Features:**\n   - Overview of primary features:\n     - AI Chatbot for real-time query resolution.\n     - Comprehensive dashboard for social media and ad data.\n     - Automated reports and insights.\n   - Interactive infographics to illustrate features and benefits.\n\n3. **Testimonials:**\n   - Quotes from satisfied users or case studies.\n   - Logos of notable clients or partners.\n\n4. **Call to Action:**\n   - Encourage users to explore the platform further or sign up for a demo.\n   - Highlight any unique selling propositions (USPs).\n\n### Page 2: Pricing\n**Objective:** Present clear and concise pricing options.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Pricing Tiers:**\n   - Display different pricing plans (e.g., Basic, Pro, Enterprise).\n   - Outline features and benefits included in each plan.\n   - Emphasize any offers like free trials or demos.\n\n2. **Comparison Chart:**\n   - Easy-to-understand chart comparing the features across different plans.\n\n3. **FAQs:**\n   - Address common questions related to pricing and subscription.\n\n### Page 3: Contact & Resources\n**Objective:** Provide users with resources and avenues to connect with the team.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Contact Us:**\n   - Contact form for inquiries.\n   - Display email address and phone number.\n   - Chatbot icon for instant assistance.\n\n2. **Resources:**\n   - Blog or articles on marketing analytics best practices.\n   - Case studies of successful platform implementations.\n   - Educational materials about AI chatbot capabilities.\n\n3. **Social Media Links:**\n   - Icons linking to the company\u2019s social media profiles.\n\n## Design Elements\n- **Layout:** Modern, sleek, and responsive design for seamless navigation across devices.\n- **Imagery:** Use graphics, data visualizations, and icons to enhance comprehension and engagement.\n- **Typography:** Clear, professional fonts that are easy to read.\n\n## Color Scheme\n- **Primary Color:** Deep Blue for trust and professionalism.\n- **Secondary Colors:** Light Gray and White for a modern, clean aesthetic.\n- **Accent Color:** Vibrant Green to highlight CTAs and important sections.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **AI Integration:** Ensure smooth AI chatbot functionality with user-friendly prompts and a guide for advanced queries.\n- **Feedback Mechanism:** Enable users to provide feedback on the AI responses to enhance learning and improve service.\n- **Analytics:** Implement tracking tools like Google Analytics to monitor user behavior and gather insights for future improvements.\n\nThis detailed plan outlines a cohesive strategy for developing the \"Hehe\" website, focusing on user engagement and seamless functionality to meet market demands."

The platform aims to simplify data analysis for marketing professionals and business owners, facilitating quick, data-driven decision-making.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Marketing professionals\n- Social media managers\n- Business owners\n- Advertisers\n\n## Website Structure\n\n### Page 1: Home\n**Objective:** Introduce the platform and highlight its key features.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Hero Section:**\n   - Platform name and tagline.\n   - Brief introduction video or animation showcasing the AI chatbot in action.\n   - Strong CTA buttons for \"Sign Up\" and \"Schedule a Demo.\"\n\n2. **Platform Features:**\n   - Overview of primary features:\n     - AI Chatbot for real-time query resolution.\n     - Comprehensive dashboard for social media and ad data.\n     - Automated reports and insights.\n   - Interactive infographics to illustrate features and benefits.\n\n3. **Testimonials:**\n   - Quotes from satisfied users or case studies.\n   - Logos of notable clients or partners.\n\n4. **Call to Action:**\n   - Encourage users to explore the platform further or sign up for a demo.\n   - Highlight any unique selling propositions (USPs).\n\n### Page 2: Pricing\n**Objective:** Present clear and concise pricing options.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Pricing Tiers:**\n   - Display different pricing plans (e.g., Basic, Pro, Enterprise).\n   - Outline features and benefits included in each plan.\n   - Emphasize any offers like free trials or demos.\n\n2. **Comparison Chart:**\n   - Easy-to-understand chart comparing the features across different plans.\n\n3. **FAQs:**\n   - Address common questions related to pricing and subscription.\n\n### Page 3: Contact & Resources\n**Objective:** Provide users with resources and avenues to connect with the team.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Contact Us:**\n   - Contact form for inquiries.\n   - Display email address and phone number.\n   - Chatbot icon for instant assistance.\n\n2. **Resources:**\n   - Blog or articles on marketing analytics best practices.\n   - Case studies of successful platform implementations.\n   - Educational materials about AI chatbot capabilities.\n\n3. **Social Media Links:**\n   - Icons linking to the company\u2019s social media profiles.\n\n## Design Elements\n- **Layout:** Modern, sleek, and responsive design for seamless navigation across devices.\n- **Imagery:** Use graphics, data visualizations, and icons to enhance comprehension and engagement.\n- **Typography:** Clear, professional fonts that are easy to read.\n\n## Color Scheme\n- **Primary Color:** Deep Blue for trust and professionalism.\n- **Secondary Colors:** Light Gray and White for a modern, clean aesthetic.\n- **Accent Color:** Vibrant Green to highlight CTAs and important sections.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **AI Integration:** Ensure smooth AI chatbot functionality with user-friendly prompts and a guide for advanced queries.\n- **Feedback Mechanism:** Enable users to provide feedback on the AI responses to enhance learning and improve service.\n- **Analytics:** Implement tracking tools like Google Analytics to monitor user behavior and gather insights for future improvements.\n\nThis detailed plan outlines a cohesive strategy for developing the \"Hehe\" website, focusing on user engagement and seamless functionality to meet market demands."

hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" alt=\"Placeholder Image\" class=\"mx-auto rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">\n        <figcaption class=\"mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500\">This is a caption for the placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 </div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Pricing.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" document.querySelectorAll('article');\n\n    monthlyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n        monthlyBtn.classList.add('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        monthlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-gray-100', 'text-black');\n        yearlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        yearlyBtn.classList.add('bg-white', 'text-black');\n        pricingCards.forEach(card => {\n            const price = card.querySelector('p').innerText;\n            card.querySelector('p').innerHTML = price.replace('/mo', '/month');\n        });\n    });\n\n Suspendisse varius enim in eros elementum tristique.\n          </p>\n        </div>\n      </article>\n      <!-- Additional FAQ items can be added in the same format -->\n    </div>\n  </div>\n  <script>\n    document.querySelectorAll('article > button').forEach(button => {\n      button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n        const content = button.nextElementSibling;\n        const icon = button.querySelector('i');\n        const expanded = button.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true';\n        button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', !expanded);\n        content.classList.toggle('hidden');\n        icon.classList.toggle('fa-plus');\n        icon.classList.toggle('fa-minus');\n      });\n    });\n  </script>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## [2025-01-05 04:35:36] ==================================================

[2025-01-05 04:35:36] âœ“ Template assembled
[2025-01-05 04:35:36] 
Step 7: Generating initial website code...
[2025-01-05 04:36:15] 
=== generate_code Details ===
[2025-01-05 04:36:15] Inputs:
[2025-01-05 04:36:15]   website_plan: "# Website Plan for \"Hehe\" - AI Marketing Analytics Platform\n\n## Purpose\nTo deliver a streamlined landing page for a marketing analytics platform that utilizes AI technology to provide instant responses to queries related to social media and ad analytics. The platform aims to simplify data analysis for marketing professionals and business owners, facilitating quick, data-driven decision-making.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Marketing professionals\n- Social media managers\n- Business owners\n- Advertisers\n\n## Website Structure\n\n### Page 1: Home\n**Objective:** Introduce the platform and highlight its key features.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Hero Section:**\n   - Platform name and tagline.\n   - Brief introduction video or animation showcasing the AI chatbot in action.\n   - Strong CTA buttons for \"Sign Up\" and \"Schedule a Demo.\"\n\n2. **Platform Features:**\n   - Overview of primary features:\n     - AI Chatbot for real-time query resolution.\n     - Comprehensive dashboard for social media and ad data.\n     - Automated reports and insights.\n   - Interactive infographics to illustrate features and benefits.\n\n3. **Testimonials:**\n   - Quotes from satisfied users or case studies.\n   - Logos of notable clients or partners.\n\n4. **Call to Action:**\n   - Encourage users to explore the platform further or sign up for a demo.\n   - Highlight any unique selling propositions (USPs).\n\n### Page 2: Pricing\n**Objective:** Present clear and concise pricing options.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Pricing Tiers:**\n   - Display different pricing plans (e.g., Basic, Pro, Enterprise).\n   - Outline features and benefits included in each plan.\n   - Emphasize any offers like free trials or demos.\n\n2. **Comparison Chart:**\n   - Easy-to-understand chart comparing the features across different plans.\n\n3. **FAQs:**\n   - Address common questions related to pricing and subscription.\n\n### Page 3: Contact & Resources\n**Objective:** Provide users with resources and avenues to connect with the team.\n\n#### Sections:\n1. **Contact Us:**\n   - Contact form for inquiries.\n   - Display email address and phone number.\n   - Chatbot icon for instant assistance.\n\n2. **Resources:**\n   - Blog or articles on marketing analytics best practices.\n   - Case studies of successful platform implementations.\n   - Educational materials about AI chatbot capabilities.\n\n3. **Social Media Links:**\n   - Icons linking to the company\u2019s social media profiles.\n\n## Design Elements\n- **Layout:** Modern, sleek, and responsive design for seamless navigation across devices.\n- **Imagery:** Use graphics, data visualizations, and icons to enhance comprehension and engagement.\n- **Typography:** Clear, professional fonts that are easy to read.\n\n## Color Scheme\n- **Primary Color:** Deep Blue for trust and professionalism.\n- **Secondary Colors:** Light Gray and White for a modern, clean aesthetic.\n- **Accent Color:** Vibrant Green to highlight CTAs and important sections.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **AI Integration:** Ensure smooth AI chatbot functionality with user-friendly prompts and a guide for advanced queries.\n- **Feedback Mechanism:** Enable users to provide feedback on the AI responses to enhance learning and improve service.\n- **Analytics:** Implement tracking tools like Google Analytics to monitor user behavior and gather insights for future improvements.\n\nThis detailed plan outlines a cohesive strategy for developing the \"Hehe\" website, focusing on user engagement and seamless functionality to meet market demands."

</div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Pricing.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" </div>\n</section>\n<script>\n    const monthlyBtn = document.getElementById('monthly-btn');\n    const yearlyBtn = document.getElementById('yearly-btn');\n    const pricingCards = document.querySelectorAll('article');\n\n    monthlyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n        monthlyBtn.classList.add('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        monthlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-gray-100', 'text-black');\n        yearlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        yearlyBtn.classList.add('bg-white', 'text-black');\n        pricingCards.forEach(card => {\n            const price = card.querySelector('p').innerText;\n            card.querySelector('p').innerHTML = price.replace('/mo', '/month');\n        });\n    });\n\n    yearlyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n        yearlyBtn.classList.add('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        yearlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-white', 'text-black');\n        monthlyBtn.classList.remove('bg-black', 'text-white');\n        monthlyBtn.classList.add('bg-white', 'text-black');\n        pricingCards.forEach(card => {\n            const price = <script>\n    document.querySelectorAll('article > button').forEach(button => {\n      button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n        const content = button.nextElementSibling;\n        const icon = button.querySelector('i');\n        const expanded = button.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true';\n        button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', !expanded);\n        content.classList.toggle('hidden');\n        icon.classList.toggle('fa-plus');\n        icon.classList.toggle('fa-minus');\n      });\n    });\n  </script>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact & Resources.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">\n content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">\n     <!--PAID Tailwind CSS CDN -- DO NOT CHANGE -->\n    <script src=\"https://cdn.tailwindcss.com\"></script>\n    <!-- Font Awesome CDN  -- DO NOT document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header The site will offer comprehensive details about various plumbing services, ensuring high search engine rankings and user accessibility.\n\n## Pages:\n1. **Home Page**\n   - **Hero Section**: \n     - Featured image with the brand tagline.\n     - Prominent CTA button for immediate contact.\n   - **Overview of Services**: \n     - Brief descriptions with links to detailed service sections.\n   - **Contact Information**: \n     -
