**Service Descriptions**: \n     - Detailed, SEO-optimized descriptions of each plumbing service offered:\n       - Emergency Plumbing\n       - Leak Detection & Repair\n       - Drain Cleaning\n       - Water Heater Installation & Repair\n       - Plumbing Fixture Installations (toilets, sinks, faucets)\n       - Pipe Repair & Replacement\n       - Sewer Line Services\n       - Commercial Plumbing Services\n       - Residential Plumbing Services\n     - Each service will have a detailed subsection including benefits, process, and FAQs.\n   - **Geo-targeted Keywords**:\n     - Highlight specific California locales served.\n\n3. **Contact Us Page**\n   - **Contact Form**: \n     - For inquiries and service requests.\n   - **Direct Contact Information**: \n     - Phone number: 888-354-5466.\n     - Email address (to be provided by the user).\n   - **Location Map**: \n     - Integration with Google Maps (if applicable) for easy location identification.\n\n## Design and Features:\n- **Color Scheme**: \n  - Primary Colors: #3B82F6 (Blue), #10B981 (Green), #6366F1 (Purple).\n- **Layout**: \n  - Clean, simple design with intuitive navigation.\n- **Mobile Responsiveness**: \n  - Fully responsive design to ensure usability on mobile devices.\n- **Images**: \n  - Use of high-quality, relevant images for services and team.\n- **SEO Optimization**:\n  - Use of local keywords like \"Plumbing Services in [City Name], CA\".\n  - Optimization of meta tags, headers, and alt text for images.\n  - Incorporation of schema markup for rich snippets.\n- **Additional Features**:\n  - The design and content strategy are aligned to attract local customers effectively."

toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p [2025-01-11 14:17:49]   "# Website Plan for \"Newest\" Luxury Car Dealership\n\n## Website Purpose\nThe website aims to showcase and promote high-profile luxury cars from BMW, Mercedes, and Ford. It will provide an engaging, informative platform for potential buyers and enthusiasts, emphasizing the dealership's premium offerings. The site will facilitate vehicle inquiries, build customer trust through rich content and aesthetics, and highlight the dealership's unique value.\n\n## Pages Overview\nThe website will consist of three main pages, each designed to provide comprehensive information and an enhanced user experience.\n\n### 1. Home Page\n- **Hero Section**: A dynamic hero slider featuring high-quality images of showcased vehicles with call-to-action buttons like \"Explore BMW\" and \"Discover Mercedes.\"\n- **Introduction**: A brief overview of the dealership's mission and values.\n- **Featured Cars**: Spotlight on the latest arrivals and featured luxury cars, with links to detailed car pages.\n- **Call to Action**: Prominent buttons for scheduling test drives and requesting more information.\n\n### 2. Inventory Page\n- **Categories**: Separate sections for BMW, Mercedes, and Ford vehicles.\n- **Filters**: Options to filter cars by price, model, and year to streamline browsing.\n- **Car Listings**: High-quality images, detailed specifications, and descriptions for each vehicle.\n- **Quick Links**: Direct access to financing options and trade-in assessments.\n\n### 3. Contact & About Us\n- **About Us**: Mission statement, company history, and team introductions.\n- **Testimonials**: Customer reviews to enhance credibility.\n- **Contact Form**: Easy-to-use form for inquiries and scheduling appointments.\n- **Location Map**: Interactive map showing dealership location and operating hours.\n- **Social Media Links**: Icons linking to the dealership's profiles for broader engagement.\n\n## Design & Aesthetics\n- **Theme**: Dark, sleek, and modern to reflect luxury and sophistication.\n- **Typography**: Elegant serif fonts for headings paired with sans-serif fonts for body text.\n- **Imagery**: High-resolution images that emphasize vehicle features and performance.\n- **Color Scheme**:\n  - Primary Colors: Deep black and dark gray for backgrounds.\n  - Accent Colors: Gold or silver for buttons and headings.\n  - Secondary Colors: Deep blue or rich burgundy for promotional banners.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **Responsive Design**: Ensuring the website is accessible and user-friendly across all devices, including mobiles and tablets.\n- **Chat Support**: Integration of chat support for instant customer queries.\n- **SEO Optimization**: Structured content and meta tags for improved search engine visibility.\n- **Analytics Integration**: Tools to track user behavior and enhance website performance.\n\n## Conclusion\nThis website plan for the \"Newest\" luxury car dealership focuses on delivering a premium online experience that aligns with the high-end nature of the cars being showcased. The strategic combination of engaging content, sophisticated design, and user-friendly features will help attract and retain potential buyers while reinforcing the dealership's brand image."

\"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"max-w-screen-lg mx-auto p-4\">\n    <header class=\"text-center mb-8\">\n        <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-2 animate-fade-in\">Image Gallery</h1>\n        <p class=\"text-gray-600 text-lg animate-fade-in delay-200\">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</p>\n    </header>\n    <div class=\"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6\">\n        <figure        </figure>\n        <figure class=\"relative bg-gray-200 aspect-square overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg transform transition duration-300 hover:scale-105\">\n            <img h-full object-cover\">\n            <button aria-label=\"View Image\" class=\"absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-0 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition duration-300\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-search text-white text-2xl opacity-0 hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300\"></i>\n            </button>\n        </figure>\n        <figure class=\"relative bg-gray-200 aspect-square overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg transform transition duration-300 hover:scale-105\">\n            <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" alt=\"Gallery Image 6\" class=\"w-full h-full object-cover\">\n            <button aria-label=\"View Image\" class=\"absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-0 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition duration-300\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-search text-white text-2xl opacity-0 hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300\"></i>\n            </button>\n        </figure>\n    </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"max-w-2xl mx-auto p-4\">\n  <!-- Profile Section -->\n  <header class=\"text-center mb-8\">\n    <div class=\"w-24 h-24 mx-auto rounded-full toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\" class=\"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-facebook fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Twitter\" class=\"text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-twitter fa-2x\"></i></a>\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on LinkedIn\" class=\"text-blue-700 hover:text-blue-900 transition-colors\"><i class=\"fab fa-linkedin fa-2x\"></i></a>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"flex flex-wrap space-x-2\">\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Design</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Web Development</button>\n        <button class=\"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400\">Tailwind CSS</button>\n      </div>\n    </article>\n    <article>\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Interactive Elements</h2>\n      <div class=\"flex space-x-4 mb-4\">\n        <a href=\"#\" aria-label=\"Share on Facebook\"   </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"max-w-2xl mx-auto p-4\">\n  <!-- Profile Section -->\n  <header class=\"text-center mb-8\">\n    <div class=\"w-24 h-24 mx-auto rounded-full toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header Step 7: Generating initial website code...
[2025-01-11 14:18:41] 
=== generate_code Details ===
[2025-01-11 14:18:41] Inputs:
[2025-01-11 14:18:41]   website_plan: "# Website Plan for \"Newest\" Luxury Car Dealership\n\n## Website Purpose\nThe website aims to showcase and promote high-profile luxury cars from BMW, Mercedes, and Ford. It will provide an engaging, informative platform for potential buyers and enthusiasts, emphasizing the dealership's premium offerings. The site will facilitate vehicle inquiries, build customer trust through rich content and aesthetics, and highlight the dealership's unique value.\n\n## Pages Overview\nThe website will consist of three main pages, each designed to provide comprehensive information and an enhanced user experience.\n\n### 1. Home Page\n- **Hero Section**: A dynamic hero slider featuring high-quality images of showcased vehicles with call-to-action buttons like \"Explore BMW\" and \"Discover Mercedes.\"\n- **Introduction**: A brief overview of the dealership's mission and values.\n- **Featured Cars**: Spotlight on the latest arrivals and featured luxury cars, with links to detailed car pages.\n- **Call to Action**: Prominent buttons for scheduling test drives and requesting more information.\n\n### 2. Inventory Page\n- **Categories**: Separate sections for BMW, Mercedes, and Ford vehicles.\n- **Filters**: Options to filter cars by price, model, and year to streamline browsing.\n- **Car Listings**: High-quality images, detailed specifications, and descriptions for each vehicle.\n- **Quick Links**: Direct access to financing options and trade-in assessments.\n\n### 3. Contact & About Us\n- **About Us**: Mission statement, company history, and team introductions.\n- **Testimonials**: Customer reviews to enhance credibility.\n- **Contact Form**: Easy-to-use form for inquiries and scheduling appointments.\n- **Location Map**: Interactive map showing dealership location and operating hours.\n- **Social Media Links**: Icons linking to the dealership's profiles for broader engagement.\n\n## Design & Aesthetics\n- **Theme**: Dark, sleek, and modern to reflect luxury and sophistication.\n- **Typography**: Elegant serif fonts for headings paired with sans-serif fonts for body text.\n- **Imagery**: High-resolution images that emphasize vehicle features and performance.\n- **Color Scheme**:\n  - Primary Colors: Deep black and dark gray for backgrounds.\n  - Accent Colors: Gold or silver for buttons and headings.\n  - Secondary Colors: Deep blue or rich burgundy for promotional banners.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **Responsive Design**: Ensuring the website is accessible and user-friendly across all devices, including mobiles and tablets.\n- **Chat Support**: Integration of chat support for instant customer queries.\n- **SEO Optimization**: Structured content and meta tags for improved search engine visibility.\n- **Analytics Integration**: Tools to track user behavior and enhance website performance.\n\n## Conclusion\nThis website plan for the \"Newest\" luxury car dealership focuses on delivering a premium online experience that aligns with the high-end nature of the cars being showcased. The strategic combination of engaging content, sophisticated design, and user-friendly features will help attract and retain potential buyers while reinforcing the dealership's brand image."
[2025-01-11 14:18:41]   website_assembled_template: "\n## Home Page.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" duration-200 group-hover:rotate-180\"></i>\n        </button>\n        <div class=\"absolute left-0 mt-2 w-64 bg-white shadow-lg rounded-md opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity   </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"max-w-2xl mx-auto p-4\">\n  <!-- Profile Section -->\n  <header class=\"text-center mb-8\">\n    <div class=\"w-24 h-24 mx-auto rounded-full Page.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">\n     <!--PAID Tailwind CSS CDN -- DO NOT CHANGE -->\n    <script src=\"https://cdn.tailwindcss.com\"></script>\n    <!-- Font Awesome CDN  -- DO NOT CHANGE  -->\n    <link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.7.2/css/all.min.css\" />\n    <script src=https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.12.5/gsap.min.js></script>\n    <script   </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"max-w-2xl mx-auto p-4\">\n  <!-- Profile Section -->\n  <header class=\"text-center mb-8\">\n    <div class=\"w-24 h-24 mx-auto rounded-full class=\"text-xl font-semibold mb-3\">Category name</h2>\n      <div class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div class=\"border border-gray-300 rounded hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-300\">\n          <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" alt=\"Link five\" class=\"w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-t\">\n          <a href=\"#\" class=\"block w-full py-2 text-center bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors duration-300\">Link six</a>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </section>\n  </nav>\n\n  <!-- Newsletter Section -->\n  <section class=\"mt-8 border-t pt-6\">\n    <h2 class=\"text-xl font-semibold mb-3\">Join our newsletter</h2>\n    <p class=\"text-gray-600 mb-4\">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</p>\n    <form class=\"flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-center\">\n      <label for=\"email\" class=\"sr-only\">Email address</label>\n      <div class=\"flex items-center w-full sm:w-auto mb-4 sm:mb-0\">\n        <i class=\"fas focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500\">\n      </div>\n      <button type=\"submit\" class=\"w-full sm:w-auto py-2 px-4 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-r hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors duration-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500\">Subscribe</button>\n    </form>\n  </section>\n</div>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact & About [2025-01-11 14:20:35]   "# Detailed Website Plan for \"Testing Debugging\" - Luxury Car Dealership\n\n## Website Purpose\nThe primary objective of the website is to showcase luxury car inventory (BMW, Mercedes, and Ford) to attract affluent customers. It aims to facilitate online inquiries, provide detailed information about available vehicles, and offer a seamless browsing experience.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Affluent individuals and car enthusiasts seeking to purchase or lease high-profile luxury vehicles.\n\n## Site Structure\nThe website will be structured into three main pages, each containing specific sections to cater to the dealership\u2019s goals.\n\n### 1. Homepage\n- **Hero Image Slider:** \n  - Rotating high-quality images of featured luxury cars (BMW, Mercedes, Ford).\n- **Introduction:**\n  - Brief overview of the dealership emphasizing luxury and exclusivity.\n- **Brand Quick Links:**\n  - Direct links to sections for BMW, Mercedes, and Ford car inventories.\n- **Call-to-Action Buttons:**\n  - Prominent buttons such as \"View Inventory\" and \"Schedule a Test Drive\".\n- **Featured Vehicles:**\n  - Highlight a selection of the latest arrivals or popular models.\n- **Customer Testimonials:**\n  - Showcase positive customer feedback to build trust.\n\n### 2. Inventory Page\n- **Filter Options:**\n  - Allow users to filter cars by make, model, price range, and year.\n- **Car Listings:**\n  - Each vehicle listing includes high-resolution images, detailed specifications, pricing, and a \"Contact Us\" button.\n- **Comparison Tool:**\n  - Feature enabling users to compare multiple vehicles side by side.\n- **Virtual Tour/360-Degree View:**\n  - Interactive feature to view the car\u2019s interior and exterior in detail.\n\n### 3. Contact & About Us Page\n- **About Us Section:**\n  - The dealership's story, mission, and values.\n  - Team introduction with professional photos and bios.\n- **Services Overview:**\n  - Details on financing options, after-sales services, and maintenance.\n- **Contact Information:**\n  - Contact form for inquiries, location map, and contact details.\n  - Live chat support for immediate assistance.\n\n## Design & Aesthetics\n- **Theme:** \n  - Dark-themed for a premium, sophisticated ambiance.\n- **Color Scheme:**\n  - Primary: Deep charcoal or black.\n  - Accent: Metallic gold or silver for highlights and CTAs.\n  - Text: Light grey or off-white for readability.\n- **Typography:**\n  - Modern sans-serif fonts ensuring clarity and elegance.\n- **Imagery:**\n  - Use of high-resolution images to enhance the luxurious perception.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **Responsive Design:**\n  - Ensure compatibility across all devices and screen sizes.\n- **SEO Optimization:**\n  - Basic SEO strategies including image alt tags and meta descriptions for improved search engine visibility.\n- **Social Media Integration:**\n  - Links to social media pages (Instagram, Facebook) to display dealership activities and customer interactions.\n- **Newsletter Signup:**\n  - Encourage visitors to subscribe for updates on new arrivals and promotions.\n\nThis plan outlines a streamlined, three-page website that encapsulates the luxury and exclusivity of the cars offered by \"Testing Debugging\". The design and features are tailored to enhance user engagement and satisfaction, aligning with the dealership\u2019s high-profile brand identity."

[2025-01-11 14:20:39]   structured_plan: "# Detailed Website Plan for \"Testing Debugging\" - Luxury Car Dealership\n\n## Website Purpose\nThe primary objective of the website is to showcase luxury car inventory (BMW, Mercedes, and Ford) to attract affluent customers. It aims to facilitate online inquiries, provide detailed information about available vehicles, and offer a seamless browsing experience.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Affluent individuals and car enthusiasts seeking to purchase or lease high-profile luxury vehicles.\n\n## Site Structure\nThe website will be structured into three main pages, each containing specific sections to cater to the dealership\u2019s goals.\n\n### 1. Homepage\n- **Hero Image Slider:** \n  - Rotating high-quality images of featured luxury cars (BMW, Mercedes, Ford).\n- **Introduction:**\n  - Brief overview of the dealership emphasizing luxury and exclusivity.\n- **Brand Quick Links:**\n  - Direct links to sections for BMW, Mercedes, and Ford car inventories.\n- **Call-to-Action Buttons:**\n  - Prominent buttons such as \"View Inventory\" and \"Schedule a Test Drive\".\n- **Featured Vehicles:**\n  - Highlight a selection of the latest arrivals or popular models.\n- **Customer Testimonials:**\n  - Showcase positive customer feedback to build trust.\n\n### 2. Inventory Page\n- **Filter Options:**\n  - Allow users to filter cars by make, model, price range, and year.\n- **Car Listings:**\n  - Each vehicle listing includes high-resolution images, detailed specifications, pricing, and a \"Contact Us\" button.\n- **Comparison Tool:**\n  - Feature enabling users to compare multiple vehicles side by side.\n- **Virtual Tour/360-Degree View:**\n  - Interactive feature to view the car\u2019s interior and exterior in detail.\n\n### 3. Contact & About Us Page\n- **About Us Section:**\n  - The dealership's story, mission, and values.\n  - Team introduction with professional photos and bios.\n- **Services Overview:**\n  - Details on financing options, after-sales services, and maintenance.\n- **Contact Information:**\n  - Contact form for inquiries, location map, and contact details.\n  - Live chat support for immediate assistance.\n\n## Design & Aesthetics\n- **Theme:** \n  - Dark-themed for a premium, sophisticated ambiance.\n- **Color Scheme:**\n  - Primary: Deep charcoal or black.\n  - Accent: Metallic gold or silver for highlights and CTAs.\n  - Text: Light grey or off-white for readability.\n- **Typography:**\n  - Modern sans-serif fonts ensuring clarity and elegance.\n- **Imagery:**\n  - Use of high-resolution images to enhance the luxurious perception.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **Responsive Design:**\n  - Ensure compatibility across all devices and screen sizes.\n- **SEO Optimization:**\n  - Basic SEO strategies including image alt tags and meta descriptions for improved search engine visibility.\n- **Social Media Integration:**\n  - Links to social media pages (Instagram, Facebook) to display dealership activities and customer interactions.\n- **Newsletter Signup:**\n  - Encourage visitors to subscribe for updates on new arrivals and promotions.\n\nThis plan outlines a streamlined, three-page website that encapsulates the luxury and exclusivity of the cars offered by \"Testing Debugging\". The design and features are tailored to enhance user engagement and satisfaction, aligning with the dealership\u2019s high-profile brand identity."

document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>",

document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-gray-800 text-white min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center p-4\">\n placeholder=\"Your email\" required class=\"w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-l focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500\">\n      </div>\n      <button type=\"submit\" class=\"w-full sm:w-auto py-2 px-4 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-r hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors duration-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500\">Subscribe</button>\n    </form>\n  </section>\n</div>\n<section class=\"container mx-auto px-4 py-8\" aria-labelledby=\"portfolio-section\">\n  <h2 id=\"portfolio-section\" class=\"sr-only\">Portfolio</h2>\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article placeholder image.</figcaption>\n      </figure>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Background Treatments</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article   </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact & About Us Page.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 [2025-01-11 14:21:39]   website_plan: "# Detailed Website Plan for \"Testing Debugging\" - Luxury Car Dealership\n\n## Website Purpose\nThe primary objective of the website is to showcase luxury car inventory (BMW, Mercedes, and Ford) to attract affluent customers. It aims to facilitate online inquiries, provide detailed information about available vehicles, and offer a seamless browsing experience.\n\n## Target Audience\n- Affluent individuals and car enthusiasts seeking to purchase or lease high-profile luxury vehicles.\n\n## Site Structure\nThe website will be structured into three main pages, each containing specific sections to cater to the dealership\u2019s goals.\n\n### 1. Homepage\n- **Hero Image Slider:** \n  - Rotating high-quality images of featured luxury cars (BMW, Mercedes, Ford).\n- **Introduction:**\n  - Brief overview of the dealership emphasizing luxury and exclusivity.\n- **Brand Quick Links:**\n  - Direct links to sections for BMW, Mercedes, and Ford car inventories.\n- **Call-to-Action Buttons:**\n  - Prominent buttons such as \"View Inventory\" and \"Schedule a Test Drive\".\n- **Featured Vehicles:**\n  - Highlight a selection of the latest arrivals or popular models.\n- **Customer Testimonials:**\n  - Showcase positive customer feedback to build trust.\n\n### 2. Inventory Page\n- **Filter Options:**\n  - Allow users to filter cars by make, model, price range, and year.\n- **Car Listings:**\n  - Each vehicle listing includes high-resolution images, detailed specifications, pricing, and a \"Contact Us\" button.\n- **Comparison Tool:**\n  - Feature enabling users to compare multiple vehicles side by side.\n- **Virtual Tour/360-Degree View:**\n  - Interactive feature to view the car\u2019s interior and exterior in detail.\n\n### 3. Contact & About Us Page\n- **About Us Section:**\n  - The dealership's story, mission, and values.\n  - Team introduction with professional photos and bios.\n- **Services Overview:**\n  - Details on financing options, after-sales services, and maintenance.\n- **Contact Information:**\n  - Contact form for inquiries, location map, and contact details.\n  - Live chat support for immediate assistance.\n\n## Design & Aesthetics\n- **Theme:** \n  - Dark-themed for a premium, sophisticated ambiance.\n- **Color Scheme:**\n  - Primary: Deep charcoal or black.\n  - Accent: Metallic gold or silver for highlights and CTAs.\n  - Text: Light grey or off-white for readability.\n- **Typography:**\n  - Modern sans-serif fonts ensuring clarity and elegance.\n- **Imagery:**\n  - Use of high-resolution images to enhance the luxurious perception.\n\n## Additional Features\n- **Responsive Design:**\n  - Ensure compatibility across all devices and screen sizes.\n- **SEO Optimization:**\n  - Basic SEO strategies including image alt tags and meta descriptions for improved search engine visibility.\n- **Social Media Integration:**\n  - Links to social media pages (Instagram, Facebook) to display dealership activities and customer interactions.\n- **Newsletter Signup:**\n  - Encourage visitors to subscribe for updates on new arrivals and promotions.\n\nThis plan outlines a streamlined, three-page website that encapsulates the luxury and exclusivity of the cars offered by \"Testing Debugging\". The design and features are tailored to enhance user engagement and satisfaction, aligning with the dealership\u2019s high-profile brand identity."

One</button>\n      <button class=\"bg-gray-800 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors w-full\">Button Two</button>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n  <script>\n    function toggleMenu() {\n      const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');\n      menu.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n    function toggleDropdown(id) {\n      const dropdown = document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-gray-800 text-white min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center p-4\">\n mb-4\">Conclusion</h2>\n      <p class=\"text-gray-700\">This section provides a summary and final thoughts on the design analysis.</p>\n    </article>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Inventory Page.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta name=\"viewport\" document.getElementById(id);\n      dropdown.classList.toggle('hidden');\n    }\n  </script>\n</div>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 class=\"text-4xl font-bold mb-4 transition-transform transform hover:scale-105\">Design Analysis</h1>\n    </header>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Layout</h2>\n      <dl class=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Desktop (Left) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The content is organized in a single-column layout with clear sections. The introduction and conclusion are separated by a middle content section with an image.</dd>\n        </div>\n        <div>\n          <dt class=\"font-bold\">Mobile (Right) Layout</dt>\n          <dd class=\"ml-6 text-gray-700\">The layout is vertically stacked, maintaining the order of sections as seen on the desktop.</dd>\n        </div>\n      </dl>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Image Placement</h2>\n      <figure class=\"text-center\">\n        <img src=\"https://placehold.co/600x400/EEE/31343C\" class=\"text-gray-700\">The background is plain, allowing the text and image to stand out without any distractions.</p>\n    </article>\n    <article class=\"mb-6\">\n      <h2 class=\"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4\">Typography Hierarchy</h2>\n      <ul class=\"list-disc list-inside space-y-2\">\n        <li><strong>Headings</strong>: Bold and larger font size for section titles like \"Introduction\" and \"Conclusion\".</li>\n        <li><strong>Body Text</strong>: Regular font weight for paragraphs.</li>\n        <li><strong>Blockquote</strong>: <blockquote class=\"border-l-4 transition duration-300\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-search text-white text-2xl opacity-0 hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300\"></i>\n            </button>\n        </figure>\n    </div>\n\n    <!-- Modal -->\n    <div id=\"modal\" class=\"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center hidden\">\n        <div class=\"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg max-w-3xl w-full relative\">\n            <button id=\"closeModal\" aria-label=\"Close Modal\" class=\"absolute top-4 right-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800\">\n                <i class=\"fas fa-times text-2xl\"></i>\n            </button>\n            <video id=\"modalVideo\" src=\"https://videos.pexels.com/video-files/6768212/6768212-uhd_1440_2732_30fps.mp4\" controls class=\"w-full h-auto\"></video>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');\n        const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');\n        const modalVideo = document.getElementById('modalVideo');\n        const imageButtons = document.querySelectorAll('figure button');\n\n        imageButtons.forEach(button => {\n            button.addEventListener('click', () => {\n                modal.classList.remove('hidden');\n                modal.classList.add('flex');\n                modalVideo.play();\n            });\n        });\n\n        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {\n            modal.classList.add('hidden');\n            modal.classList.remove('flex');\n            modalVideo.pause();\n            modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n        });\n\n        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {\n            if (e.target === modal) {\n                modal.classList.add('hidden');\n                modal.classList.remove('flex');\n                modalVideo.pause();\n                modalVideo.currentTime = 0;\n            }\n        });\n    </script>\n</section>\n\n<style>\n@keyframes fade-in {\n    from { opacity: 0; }\n    to { opacity: 1; }\n}\n.animate-fade-in {\n    animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out;\n}\n.delay-200 {\n    animation-delay: 0.2s;\n}\n</style>\n\n</body>\n</html>\n```\n\n## Contact & About Us Page.html\n```html\n<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n    <meta = document.querySelector('button[aria-label=\"Previous\"]');\n  const nextBtn = document.querySelector('button[aria-label=\"Next\"]');\n  const carousel = document.querySelector('[role=\"list\"]');\n\n  prevBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n    carousel.scrollBy({ left: -300, behavior: 'smooth' });\n  });\n\n  nextBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {\n    carousel.scrollBy({ left: 300, behavior: 'smooth' });\n  });\n</script>\n<section class=\"bg-white py-8\">\n  <div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\">\n    <header class=\"mb-8\">\n      <h1 border-gray-300 pl-4 italic text-gray-600 transition-colors hover:text-gray-800\">This is an example of a blockquote used for emphasis.</blockquote></li>\n      </ul>\n    </article>\n    <article
